ComicInfo.Summary: The all suburban-New Jersey issue! Weaving between 1985 and the present day, the third issue of Peter Bagge's triumphant return to Hate spans three generations of the Bradley family and friend circle. Ma 'MAGA" Bradley has moved into an assisted living facility, and when Buddy and Lisa pay an obligatory visit, they discover that Stinky's mom lives there as well, forcing Buddy to face his lingering guilt over Stinky's death. Meanwhile, in flashback, teenage Stinky proves every bit as prone to recklessness as he did as an adult. Hate is back and more fiercely funny than ever!

ComicInfo.Characters: Babs Bradley, Buddy Bradley, Lisa Leavenworth, Mrs Bradley, Stinky
